pages.text: $(li)Endermapteras are small beetles that can be found in the fight with the $(l)Ender Dragon$() and in the $(l:patchouli:structures/ruined_citadel)Ruined Citadell$(/l) of the End.$(br)$(li)They are aggressive and are usually found in large groups.$(br)$(li)They may drop a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/cataclysm/void_jaw)Void Jaw$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/ender_pearl)Ender Pearls$(/l) upon death.
